title: PS3 Controller for MAC
description:
DON'T GET SO EXCITED...DOES NOT SUPPORT BLUETOOTH...
...YET! 

The HID descriptor reported by the device appears to not support the spacial information reported by the controller, or the pressure information reported by almost all of the buttons on the device.
Thus, as an interim solution for people who just can't wait for the finished driver, provided is a basic driver which simply allows the controller to work on OSX.

Happy gaming!
